Parameter.value: root\cimv2::select PercentProcessorTime from Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfOS_Processor where name = '_Total'
LANG=en_US.utf8;top -b -n 3 -d 2 | grep -i "cpu(s)" | tail -n+3 | awk -F , '{if($4~/id/){printf ("%0.2f",100-substr($4,1,length($4)-3));}}'
setenv LANG en_US.UTF-8;vmstat 1 2 | awk 'BEGIN{id_flag=0;idl=0;}NR>1{if($0~/id/){for(i=1;i<=NF;i++){if($i~/id/)id_flag=i;}}idl=$id_flag;}END{printf "%.2f", 100.00-idl}'
LANG=en_US.UTF-8;sar -u 1 2| awk 'BEGIN{idle=0;idloff=0;}{if($0~/idle/){for(i=1;i<=NF;i++){if($i~/idle/)idloff=i;}}else if(NF>1){idle=$idloff;}}END{syscpuload=100.00-idle;printf "%.2f", syscpuload}'

root\cimv2::select FreePhysicalMemory,TotalVisibleMEMorySize from Win32_OperatingSystem
SELECT (totalMemSize - Memory)/totalMemSize*100 AS memRate
LANG=en_US.utf8;cat /proc/meminfo | egrep '(^MemTotal|^MemFree|^Buffers|^Cached)' | awk '{if(NR==1){total=$2}else{free+=$2}};END {print free}'
setenv LANG en_US.UTF-8;vmstat 1 2 | awk 'BEGIN{flag_fre=0;memfree=0;}NR>1{if($0~/fre/){for(i=1;i<=NF;i++){if($i~/fre/)flag_fre=i;}}memfree=$flag_fre;}END{printf "%.0f", memfree}'
LANG=en_US.UTF-8;sar -r 1 | awk 'BEGIN{memfree=0}{while(getline >0){memfree=$2;}}END{printf "%.0f",memfree*4}'
vmstat 1 2 | awk 'BEGIN{flag_fre=0;memfree=0;}NR>1{if($0~/fre/){for(i=1;i<=NF;i++){if($i~/fre/)flag_fre=i;}}memfree=$flag_fre;}END{printf "%.0f", memfree}'
svmon -G |egrep '(in use|memory)'|awk 'BEGIN{total=0;inused=0;}{if($1~/memory/){total=$2;}else{inused=$3;}}END{printf "%.0f",(total-inused)*4}'
sar -r 1 | awk 'BEGIN{memfree=0}{while(getline >0){memfree=$2;}}END{printf "%.0f",memfree*4}'
LANG=en_US.utf8;vmstat 1 2 | awk 'BEGIN{flag_fre=0;memfree=0;}NR>1{if($0~/fre/){for(i=1;i<=NF;i++){if($i~/fre/)flag_fre=i;}}memfree=$flag_fre;}END{printf "%.0f", memfree*4}'
SELECT (1-memRate/${totalMemSize})*100 as memRate
LANG=en_US.utf8;cat /proc/meminfo | egrep '(^MemTotal|^MemFree|^Buffers|^Cached)' | awk '{if(NR==1){total=$2}else{free+=$2}};END {print free}'
setenv LANG en_US.UTF-8;vmstat 1 2 | awk 'BEGIN{flag_fre=0;memfree=0;}NR>1{if($0~/fre/){for(i=1;i<=NF;i++){if($i~/fre/)flag_fre=i;}}memfree=$flag_fre;}END{printf "%.0f", memfree}'
LANG=en_US.UTF-8;sar -r 1 | awk 'BEGIN{memfree=0}{while(getline >0){memfree=$2;}}END{printf "%.0f",memfree*4}'
vmstat 1 2 | awk 'BEGIN{flag_fre=0;memfree=0;}NR>1{if($0~/fre/){for(i=1;i<=NF;i++){if($i~/fre/)flag_fre=i;}}memfree=$flag_fre;}END{printf "%.0f", memfree}'
svmon -G |egrep '(in use|memory)'|awk 'BEGIN{total=0;inused=0;}{if($1~/memory/){total=$2;}else{inused=$3;}}END{printf "%.0f",(total-inused)*4}'
sar -r 1 | awk 'BEGIN{memfree=0}{while(getline >0){memfree=$2;}}END{printf "%.0f",memfree*4}'
LANG=en_US.utf8;vmstat 1 2 | awk 'BEGIN{flag_fre=0;memfree=0;}NR>1{if($0~/fre/){for(i=1;i<=NF;i++){if($i~/fre/)flag_fre=i;}}memfree=$flag_fre;}END{printf "%.0f", memfree*4}'
SELECT (1-memRate/${totalMemSize})*100 as memRate
root\cimv2::SELECT Caption from Win32_OperatingSystem

LANG=en_US.utf8;cat /etc/redflag-release 2>/dev/null ||cat /etc/redhat-release 2>/dev/null ||head -n 1 /etc/SuSE-release 2>/dev/null ||cat /etc/mvl-release 2>/dev/null ||cat /etc/wrs-release 2>/dev/null ||cat /etc/debian_version 2>/dev/null || cat /etc/debian_version 2>/dev/null ||cat /etc/lsb-release

uname -svn|awk '{printf "%s %s",$1,$3}'
LANG=en_US.utf8;uname -a|awk '{printf "%s %s",$1,$3}'

root\cimv2::select PercentProcessorTime from Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfProc_Thread where Name like 'mysqld%'
root\cimv2::select name from Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfOS_Processor where name !='_Total'
SELECT (sum(chk_cpurate_wmi))/count(cpuCore) as appCpuRate

LANG=en_US.utf8;pids=`ps -ef |egrep "mysqld"|egrep -v egrep |awk '{thepids=thepids "," $2 ",";} END{printf "%s",thepids}'`;cpuNum=`cat /proc/cpuinfo | egrep "processor[[:space:]]*:" | wc -l`; top -b -n 2 -U mysql | awk -v pids=$pids -v cpuNum=$cpuNum '$1=="PID" {block_num++; next} block_num==2&&index(pids, "," $1 ",")>0{cpuUsage=cpuUsage+$9;} END{if(cpuNum!=0){cpuUsage=cpuUsage/cpuNum;}printf("%0.2f",cpuUsage);}'
setenv LANG en_US.UTF-8;ps -aux | egrep mysqld | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $3}'
LANG=en_US.UTF-8;ps -eo 'pcpu comm args' | egrep mysqld | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
ps -eo 'pcpu comm args' | egrep mysqld | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
ps auwwx |egrep mysqld | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $3}'
ps -eo 'pcpu comm args' | egrep mysqld | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
LANG=en_US.utf8;UNIX95= ps -eo 'pcpu comm args' | egrep mysqld | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
SELECT sum(appCpuRate) as appCpuRate

LANG=en_US.utf8;pids=`ps -ef |egrep "mysqld"|egrep -v egrep |awk '{thepids=thepids "," $2 ",";} END{printf "%s",thepids}'`;cpuNum=`cat /proc/cpuinfo | egrep "processor[[:space:]]*:" | wc -l`; top -b -n 2 -U mysql | awk -v pids=$pids -v cpuNum=$cpuNum '$1=="PID" {block_num++; next} block_num==2&&index(pids, "," $1 ",")>0{cpuUsage=cpuUsage+$9;} END{if(cpuNum!=0){cpuUsage=cpuUsage/cpuNum;}printf("%0.2f",cpuUsage);}'
setenv LANG en_US.UTF-8;ps -aux | egrep mysqld | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $3}'
LANG=en_US.UTF-8;ps -eo 'pcpu comm args' | egrep mysqld | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'

root\cimv2::select WorkingSet from Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfProc_Process where Name like 'mysqld%'
root\cimv2::SELECT TotalVisibleMEMorySize FROM Win32_OperatingSystem
SELECT (100*sum(Memory)/totalMemSize/1024) as appMemRate

LANG=en_US.utf8;pids=`ps -ef |egrep "mysqld"|egrep -v egrep |awk '{thepids=thepids "," $2 ",";} END{printf "%s",thepids}'`;top -bS -n 1 -d 1 | awk -v pids=$pids 'BEGIN{res=0;shr=0;real=0;tmp_res=0;tmp_shr=0;} {if(index(pids, "," $1 ",") > 0){ if($6~/m|M/){tmp_res=substr($6,1,length($6)-1);res=res+tmp_res*1024;}else if($6~/g|G/) {tmp_res=substr($6,1,length($6)-1);res=res+tmp_res*1024*1024;}else{res=res+$6;}; if($7~/m|M/){tmp_shr=substr($7,1,length($7)-1);shr=shr+tmp_shr*1024} else if($7~/g|G/){tmp_shr=substr($7,1,length($7)-1);shr=shr+tmp_shr*1024*1024}else{shr=shr+$7;};}} END{real=res-shr;printf("%d",real);}'
setenv LANG en_US.UTF-8;ps -aux | egrep mysqld | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $4}'
LANG=en_US.UTF-8;ps -eo 'vsz comm args' | egrep mysqld | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
ps -eo 'pmem comm args' | egrep mysqld | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
ps auwwx |egrep mysqld | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $4}'
ps -eo 'vsz comm args' | egrep mysqld | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'

LANG=en_US.utf8;rm -f /tmp/topShellResult.log;top -s2 -d1 -P -n65535 -f /tmp/topShellResult.log; cat /tmp/topShellResult.log | egrep 'mysqld' | awk 'BEGIN{res_data=0;res_temp=0;} {res_temp=substr($9,1,length($9)-1);if($9~/K/){res_data=res_data+res_temp;} else if($9~/M/){res_data=res_data+res_temp*1024;}} END{printf ("%d",res_data);}'

LANG=en_US.utf8;pids=`ps -ef |egrep "mysqld"|egrep -v egrep |awk '{thepids=thepids "," $2 ",";} END{printf "%s",thepids}'`;top -bS -n 1 -d 1 | awk -v pids=$pids 'BEGIN{res=0;shr=0;real=0;tmp_res=0;tmp_shr=0;} {if(index(pids, "," $1 ",") > 0){ if($6~/m|M/){tmp_res=substr($6,1,length($6)-1);res=res+tmp_res*1024;}else if($6~/g|G/) {tmp_res=substr($6,1,length($6)-1);res=res+tmp_res*1024*1024;}else{res=res+$6;}; if($7~/m|M/){tmp_shr=substr($7,1,length($7)-1);shr=shr+tmp_shr*1024} else if($7~/g|G/){tmp_shr=substr($7,1,length($7)-1);shr=shr+tmp_shr*1024*1024}else{shr=shr+$7;};}} END{real=res-shr;printf("%d",real);}'
setenv LANG en_US.UTF-8;ps -aux | egrep mysqld | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $4}'
LANG=en_US.UTF-8;ps -eo 'vsz comm args' | egrep mysqld | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
ps -eo 'pmem comm args' | egrep mysqld | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
ps auwwx |egrep mysqld | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $4}'
ps -eo 'vsz comm args' | egrep mysqld | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'

LANG=en_US.utf8;rm -f /tmp/topShellResult.log;top -s2 -d1 -P -n65535 -f /tmp/topShellResult.log; cat /tmp/topShellResult.log | egrep 'mysqld' | awk 'BEGIN{res_data=0;res_temp=0;} {res_temp=substr($9,1,length($9)-1);if($9~/K/){res_data=res_data+res_temp;} else if($9~/M/){res_data=res_data+res_temp*1024;}} END{printf ("%d",res_data);}'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_VARIABLES WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'version'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'Uptime'
select @@character_set_database
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_VARIABLES WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'datadir'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_VARIABLES WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'basedir'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'Connections'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'Table_locks_waited'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'Table_locks_immediate'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'Qcache_inserts'
select 1 from dual
select @@storage_engine
select @@max_connections
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_VARIABLES WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'key_buffer_size'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_VARIABLES WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'query_cache_size'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'Key_reads'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'Key_read_requests'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'Threads_connected'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'Threads_running'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'Threads_cached'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'Threads_created'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'Threads_cached'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'Threads_created'
SELECT ((cachedThreadCount/curSessionCount)*100) as cacheAccessRate
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'Handler_read_rnd_next'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'Com_select'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'Handler_read_rnd_next'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'Com_select'
SELECT (100*comSelect/dataFileRequestCount) as tableScanRate
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'Qcache_hits'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'Qcache_hits'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'Com_select'
SELECT ((qcacheHitCount/(qcacheHitCount+comSelect))*100) as qcacheHitRate
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_VARIABLES WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'query_cache_size'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME= 'qcache_free_memory'
SELECT (((queryBufferSize-queryFreeSize)/queryBufferSize)*100) as qcacheUsesRate
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='qcache_free_blocks'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='qcache_total_blocks'
SELECT ((qcacheFreeBlocks/qcacheTotalBlocks)*100) as qcacheBlockRate
SELECT COUNT(host) FROM information_schema.PROCESSLIST
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Aborted_clients'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Aborted_connects'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Bytes_received'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Bytes_sent'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Connections'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Delayed_insert_threads'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Delayed_errors'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Flush_commands'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Handler_delete'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Handler_read_first'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Handler_read_next'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Handler_read_rnd'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Handler_update'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Handler_write'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Key_blocks_used'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Key_read_requests'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Key_reads'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Key_reads'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Key_read_requests'
SELECT (keyReads*100/keyRequest) as cacheMissRate
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Key_writes'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Max_used_connections'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Open_tables'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Open_files'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Open_streams'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Opened_tables'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Questions'
SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.GLOBAL_STATUS WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='Slow_queries'
show databases

SELECT schema_name,IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(data_length+index_length)/1024/1024,4),0) 'db size' FROM information_schema.SCHEMATA a LEFT JOIN information_schema.TABLES b ON a.schema_name=b.table_schema GROUP BY schema_name
SELECT schema_name,COUNT(TABLE_NAME) FROM information_schema.SCHEMATA a LEFT JOIN information_schema.TABLES b ON a.schema_name=b.table_schema GROUP BY schema_name
SELECT schema_name,COUNT(TABLE_NAME) FROM information_schema.SCHEMATA a LEFT JOIN information_schema.TABLES b ON a.schema_name=b.table_schema GROUP BY schema_name
SELECT ((mySqlStateAvailability>=0?'1':'0')) as dbAvailability,dbdataBaseName

select b.THREAD_ID,a.USER,a.HOST,c.trx_state,b.PROCESSLIST_HOST from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.PROCESSLIST a,performance_schema.threads b,information_schema.innodb_trx c where a.id=b.PROCESSLIST_ID and b.PROCESSLIST_ID=c.trx_mysql_thread_id and c.trx_state='LOCK WAIT'
